description: The Marina Strawberry Tree is an amazing evergreen shrub that produces beautiful white-pink flowers in spring and small apple-like fruits in summer. This small tree is an excellent addition to every garden and can even be used as a patio plant. It is a hardy tree that requires little care and maintenance and possesses a unique, compact shape. Its rich green foliage and bark with beautiful peeling texture make this shrub stand out. It is a great attraction to various birds and garden pollinators. Furthermore, it is salt tolerant, drought tolerant and cold tolerant, making it an ideal plant for most landscapes.
